name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
If you get a subsidy of 1 million yuan for having a child, will you have one?
Answer: Yes, but not a live one, but a baby to be expected, or a baby that is not ready yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 19, multiple media outlets reported that the minutes of a conversation between Huawei founder and CEO Ren Zhengfei and the ICPC Foundation were exposed. Ren Zhengfei said that Apple is Huawei's teacher and that he is an Apple fan.
"It is very fortunate to have a teacher. I have the opportunity to learn and compare. If I say that I am an Apple fan from these perspectives, it is not an exaggeration."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 19, the Public Security Department of the Liaoning Provincial Government issued a notice to confiscate controlled knives from the public. Those who fail to hand them over within the deadline will face severe punishment according to law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 19, Hubei Jingzhou, Shishou City Diaoguan Town Primary School. A citizen posted a video saying that his grandson in the second grade was designated by the teacher to buy teaching materials at the store opposite the school. He said that last week the child came back and said that the teacher asked him to buy teaching materials opposite the school, but he forgot to buy them. He was criticized by the teacher on Monday. This morning, he went to see a man and a woman selling them on the roadside. They mainly sell to first and second graders, and they are designated. The children don’t know many words.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Because of his personal experience at Urumqi Airport, the UP host is currently suffering from severe online violence.
I wonder if the "Guiding Opinions" issued by the Central Cyberspace Affairs Office a few days ago to strictly, focus on, and legally crack down on online violence counts?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On September 19, the Nanning No. 6 Vocational School in Nanning, Guangxi stipulated that students are not allowed to bring food into the school. If they are found by the guards, they will be stopped from entering the school or their food will be confiscated. They will also need to take photos of the students involved and post them in the class teacher group for each class teacher to claim and criticize and educate the students involved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 12, a school bullying incident occurred at Nanning Yinhai Sanya School. A girl beat her roommate to a bloody face and almost fainted because of trivial matters. Afterwards, she calmly cleaned up the scene to cover up the traces and said, "No one can control me. If you make me angry, I can kill people." Because it was rumored online that she was the niece of a certain military commander. Therefore, netizens called her the "real version of "Dark Glory"." According to the joint open letter, the girl's mother not only did not apologize after the incident, but instead boasted in the circle of friends that her daughter was a "hexagonal female warrior" with full firepower. On September 16, all the angry parents of Class 5, Grade 2023 of Yinhai Sanya School jointly asked the school to persuade her to withdraw.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 20, at the Wuhan Sports Center, the Chinese team Wuhan Three Towns played against the Japanese team Saitama Urawa Red Diamonds. Some Chinese fans cursed the Japanese fans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Fans at the scene also held up a banner that read "The Ocean is Crying"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It was reported online that the Yunnan Qujing Qilin Music Festival, originally scheduled for September 29-30, was cancelled. The person in charge said it was for the sake of stability for the Asian Games.
However, according to previous news of the music festival being cancelled, because the music festival conflicts with Martyrs' Memorial Day, it should have been cancelled even if there were no Asian Games.
